# xelon_template (Data Source)

The template data source provides information about an existing template.

## Example Usage

### Using ID

```terraform
data "xelon_template" "debian" {
  id = "435f15aa750a"
}
```

### Using name

```terraform
data "xelon_template" "debian" {
  name = "debian-13.2"
}
```

### Using ID and name

```terraform
data "xelon_template" "debian" {
  id   = "435f15aa750a"
  name = "debian-13.2"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the template.
- `name` (String) The name of the template.

### Read-Only

- `category` (String) The category of the template.
- `cloud_id` (String) The ID of the cloud.
- `description` (String) The template description.
- `type` (String) The type of the template.
